alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Monroe (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 5:16AM CDT until August 02 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central and northeast Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Audrain. In northeast Missouri, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 800 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 516 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paris, Madison and Holliday.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
